
# UP
-----

START TRANSACTION;

CREATE TABLE "Status" (
    "id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "name" text NOT NULL,
    "description" text NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Status" PRIMARY KEY ("id")
);

INSERT INTO "Status" ("name", "description")
VALUES 
    ('OPEN', 'The status is [Open]'),
    ('IN PROGRESS', ' The status is [In progress]'), 
    ('ON HOLD', 'The status is [On hold]'),
    ('CANCELD', 'The status is [Canceled]'),
    ('DONE', 'The status is [Done]');

COMMIT;


# DOWN
-----

START TRANSACTION;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "Status";

COMMIT
